title: spotlessJavaCheck fails in main

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

labels.name: dev experience
labels.description: The build system, things that enable easier development etc.

body: QBFT Reference tests should adopt Google code format.

Probably should be excluding external resources like that from the spotless check in the first place.

But also probably good for the QBFT reference tests to use google code format if that's in our control.  Could still get varying styles because of different versions of spotless in some cases though.

This has been fixed as part of #2761 which excludes the qbft reference tests from the spotless check.

Agree that we should make sure that the QBFT reference tests are using google code format.
